Message.Title: the tourist President
Message.Msg: A western source in Cairo familiar with the truce negotiations reported that Obama has not yet decided whether he wants to be directly involved in any ceasefire deal, which in any case has not reached the concluding stage. The President's official calendar shows he will tape an episode of The View before playing golf, then dinner with Beyonce'.

Message.Title: Odumbomites
Message.Msg: Your man won. What's with all the hate spew on this here tarded bored. Has the house got yer panties wadded still

Topic.Title: The facts are in on the golden state, and they ain't pretty

Message.Msg: The weasel speaks from his hideout. We know you don't like Mexicans, gays, chickens, and now poor folks. BTW, what tax revenues from real estate...who is going to buy all these homes your middle easterner friends down in Irvine.
